abstract.p: John Schmitz, vice president for creative at iXL, is named to new post of chief creative officer; Kristen Beveridge, creative director, is named to new post of director for design group and David Warren is named director for new content group; Doug Speidel is named to new posts of partner and chief creative officer at Direct Partners; Laura Schoen is named to new post of president at BSMG Worldwide; Andrew Swinand is named to new post of general manager at San Francisco office of Starcom IP (S)

block.p: * John Schmitz, vice president for creative at iXL, New York, was named to the new post of chief creative officer. Also, Kristen Beveridge, creative director, was named to the new post of director for the design group and David Warren, also a creative director, was named director for a new content group. * Doug Speidel, senior vice president and creative director at Direct Partners, Marina del Rey, Calif., part of the Omnicom Group, was named to the new posts of partner and chief creative officer. * Laura Schoen was named to the new post of president at the global health care practice of BSMG Worldwide, New York, part of True North Communications. She had been president at Presence Euro RSCG, New York, part of the Euro RSCG Worldwide unit of Havas Advertising. * Andrew Swinand was named to the new post of general manager at the San Francisco office of Starcom IP, part of the Starcom MediaVest Group unit of the B Com3 Group. He had been marketing director at Reflect.com, San Francisco, which is backed by Procter & Gamble and two venture capital funds.
